intro: Brachypodium peruvianum, commonly known as the Peruvian basketgrass, is a grass species native to South America. It is characterized by its slender,丛生 growth habit and narrow, linear leaves. The plant produces small, spike-like inflorescences that bear numerous tiny flowers. It thrives in temperate climates and is often found in open, disturbed areas. Due to its hardiness and ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in gardens.
